title: Kedarnath Temple
description: Nestled in the Himalayas, Kedarnath Temple is one of the 12 Jyotirlingas dedicated to Lord Shiva. Located in Uttarakhand, this sacred site attracts millions during its open season (April-November). The serene beauty and spiritual aura make it a must-visit.

title: Golden Temple
description: Sri Harmandir Sahib in Amritsar, Punjab, is the holiest site in Sikhism. Known for its stunning golden architecture and serene Sarovar, it welcomes devotees of all faiths. Visit for the divine langar and peaceful ambiance.

title: Tirupati Balaji Temple
description: Located in Andhra Pradesh, Sri Venkateswara Temple is one of the richest and most visited temples in India. Dedicated to Lord Vishnu, it draws millions for its sacred darshan and vibrant rituals.

title: Kashi Vishwanath Temple
description: One of the holiest Hindu temples dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh. Situated on the Ganges, itâ€™s a spiritual hub known for its vibrant ghats and rituals.

title: Ajmer Sharif Dargah
description: A sacred Sufi shrine in Ajmer, Rajasthan, dedicated to Moinuddin Chishti. This spiritual site attracts devotees seeking blessings and peace, known for its serene ambiance.

title: Mahabodhi Temple
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site in Bodh Gaya, Bihar, marking the place where Buddha attained enlightenment. A key Buddhist pilgrimage site with a serene atmosphere.
